revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Mapower Electronics |model=WiFi DAS |revision=(WI22) |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=10/19/2012 |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=mobile NAS,hard drive enclosure |fcc_id=LD3WIFIDON22 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT5350 |cpu1_cspeed=360 |fla1= |fla1_brand=Eon |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L2561616A-6T |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT5350 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |flags=battery |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:0A:D8 }} [http://www.mapower.com.tw/mapower/Product.asp?CateID=303&LineID=43 Product page]
*"EAW2-055-DG-10" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :A label in the internal FCC photos shows the device with a 00:0A:D8 OUI. *This device is similar to the [[Mapower_Electronics_WiFi_DAS_(WI21)|(WI21)]].. but this device appears to :only support external USB 2.0 drives (no internal 2.5" SATA bay).
